p: Clinical characteristics of the 15 patients included for RNA-Seq analysis (CI group, n = 11; control group, n = 4) are shown in Table 1. The maternal and gestational ages at the time of sample collection were not significantly different between the two groups. Four women in the CI group delivered preterm [CI-preterm group; gestational weeks at delivery, 19.8 (17.4–30.9)], and the others were delivered after 37 gestational weeks [CI-term group; gestational weeks at delivery, 38.0 (37.0–39.0)]. White blood cell (WBC) and neutrophil counts of the CI-preterm group were significantly higher than those of the CI-term group (Table 1).
